org.sat4j.specs

インタフェース Constr

  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    IConstr
    既知のサブインタフェースのリスト:
    IWatchPb, PBConstr
    既知の実装クラスのリスト:
    AtLeast, AtLeastPB, BinaryClause, BinaryClauses, CBClause, HTClause, LearntBinaryClause, LearntBinaryClausePB, LearntHTClause, LearntHTClausePB, LearntWLClause, MaxWatchCard, MaxWatchPb, MaxWatchPbLong, MaxWatchPbLongCP, MinWatchCard, MinWatchCardPB, MinWatchPb, MinWatchPbLong, MinWatchPbLongCP, OriginalBinaryClause, OriginalBinaryClausePB, OriginalHTClause, OriginalHTClausePB, OriginalWLClause, PuebloMinWatchPb, UnitClause, UnitClausePB, UnitClauses, UnitClausesPB, WatchPb, WatchPbLong, WatchPbLongCP, WLClause

    public interface Constr
extends IConstr
    Basic constraint abstraction used in this solvers. Any new constraint type should implement that interface. That interface was moved in this package from org.sat4j.minisat.core package in release 2.3.6 to avoid cyclic dependencies with org.sat4j.specs.

      • インタフェースから継承されたメソッド org.sat4j.specs.IConstr

        canBePropagatedMultipleTimes, get, getActivity, learnt, size, toString

    • フィールドの詳細

      • TAUTOLOGY

        static final Constr TAUTOLOGY

    • メソッドの詳細

      • remove

        void remove(UnitPropagationListener upl)
        Remove a constraint from the solver.
        パラメータ:
        upl -
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.1

      • simplify

        boolean simplify()
        Simplifies a constraint, by removing top level falsified literals for instance.
        戻り値:
        true iff the constraint is satisfied and can be removed from the database.

      • calcReason

        void calcReason(int p,
                IVecInt outReason)
        Compute the reason for a given assignment. If the constraint is a clause, it is supposed to be either a unit clause or a falsified one. It is expected that the falsification of the constraint has been detected as soon at is occurs (e.g. using Propagatable.propagate(UnitPropagationListener, int).
        パラメータ:
        p - a satisfied literal (or Lit.UNDEFINED)
        outReason - the list of falsified literals whose negation is the reason of the assignment of p to true.

      • calcReasonOnTheFly

        void calcReasonOnTheFly(int p,
                        IVecInt trail,
                        IVecInt outReason)
        Compute the reason for a given assignment in a the constraint created on the fly in the solver. Compared to the method calcReason(int, IVecInt), the falsification may not have been detected as soon as possible. As such, it is necessary to take into account the order of the literals in the trail.
        パラメータ:
        p - a satisfied literal (or Lit.UNDEFINED)
        trail - all the literals satisfied in the solvers, should not be modified.
        outReason - a list of falsified literals whose negation is the reason of the assignment of p to true.
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.3.3

      • incActivity

        void incActivity(double claInc)
        Increase the constraint activity.
        パラメータ:
        claInc - the value to increase the activity with

      • forwardActivity

        @Deprecated
void forwardActivity(double claInc)
        非推奨です。 
        パラメータ:
        claInc -
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.1

      • locked

        boolean locked()
        Indicate wether a constraint is responsible from an assignment.
        戻り値:
        true if a constraint is a "reason" for an assignment.

      • setLearnt

        void setLearnt()
        Mark a constraint as learnt.

      • register

        void register()
        Register the constraint to the solver.

      • rescaleBy

        void rescaleBy(double d)
        Rescale the clause activity by a value.
        パラメータ:
        d - the value to rescale the clause activity with.

      • setActivity

        void setActivity(double d)
        Set the activity at a specific value
        パラメータ:
        d - the new activity
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.3.1

      • assertConstraint

        void assertConstraint(UnitPropagationListener s)
        Method called when the constraint is to be asserted. It means that the constraint was learned during the search and it should now propagate some truth values. In the clausal case, only one literal should be propagated. In other cases, it might be different.
        パラメータ:
        s - a UnitPropagationListener to use for unit propagation.

      • assertConstraintIfNeeded

        void assertConstraintIfNeeded(UnitPropagationListener s)
        Method called when the constraint is added to the solver "on the fly". In that case, the constraint may or may not have to propagate some literals, unlike the assertConstraint(UnitPropagationListener) method.
        パラメータ:
        s - a UnitPropagationListener to use for unit propagation.
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.3.4

      • canBeSatisfiedByCountingLiterals

        boolean canBeSatisfiedByCountingLiterals()
        Check that a specific constraint can be checked for satisfiability by simply counting its number of satisfied literals. This is the case for clauses and cardinality constraints. It is not the case for pseudo boolean constraints.
        戻り値:
        true iff the constraints can be satisfied by satisfying a given number of literals;
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.3.6

      • requiredNumberOfSatisfiedLiterals

        int requiredNumberOfSatisfiedLiterals()
        Returns the number of literals necessary to satisfy that constraint. That method only make sense if the canBeSatisfiedByCountingLiterals() returns true. For clauses, the value returned will be 1. For cardinality constraints, the value returned will be its degree.
        戻り値:
        the number of literals
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.3.6

      • isSatisfied

        boolean isSatisfied()
        Checks that a constraint is satisfied. That method may be time consuming since it may require to go through all the literals of the constraints.
        戻り値:
        true iff the constraint is satisfied under the current assignment.
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.3.6

      • getAssertionLevel

        int getAssertionLevel(IVecInt trail,
                      int decisionLevel)
        Returns the level at which a constraint becomes assertive. Note that if a constraint can propagate multiple times, such method should return the first decision level at which the clause is assertive. Note that the implementation of isAssertive must be in sync with assertConstraint(UnitPropagationListener) since the usual step after detecting that a constraint is assertive will be to assert it.
        パラメータ:
        trail - the internal solver trail
        decisionLevel - the current decision level
        戻り値:
        the decision level under which the constraint becomes assertive, else -1.
        導入されたバージョン:
        2.3.6
        関連項目:
        IConstr.canBePropagatedMultipleTimes()
